sentences.english: Jet Li has decided to quit acting for a year to focus on disaster relief and reconstruction of quake-hit areas.
sentences.chinese: 李連杰決定息影一年，專注賑災及災區重建工作。

sentences.english: Zhili relief bureau is the special agence of handling reliving in Zhili region.
sentences.chinese: 直隸賑撫局是清末直隸地區專門辦理賑災救濟機關。

sentences.english: In recent days I am busy with the disaster relief activities.
sentences.chinese: 最近幾天都忙於賑災的各項活動中。

sentences.english: Chengdu Police has begun severely punishing such fraudulent activities that prevent relief supplies from getting to the quake victims.
sentences.chinese: 成都警方正嚴查非法獲取和使用賑災物資的行爲。

sentences.english: Let's gather many a little love heart to support disaster relief kindness.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們匯聚點滴愛心，支持賑災義舉。

definition: to relieve disaster/to help disaster victims
service to the public/public welfare undertaking/charity/social facility
Tung Wah Group of Hospitals (Hong Kong)
top priority job/matter of vital importance
emergency relief/to help the needy with cash or goods
